MediaPortal turns your PC in a very advanced Multi-Media Center / HTPC.
With MediaPortal you can enjoy listening to your favorite music, radio, viewing your digital photos,
watching Videos, DVDs and live TV and much more.
This wizard will help you to setup Mediaportal quickly and easily. Please follow all the steps,
and start by setting your language and location below:
Now press the Next button to begin
Congratulations. Mediaportal is now setup and ready to use
